name: Boot Up Required
description:
Submission for Trijam #193, theme is Patience

Enemies are attacking your turret! You'll have to defend yourself, but unfortunately, your turret is not fully powered yet.  Your turret will start to power up over time, indicated by the bar at the bottom,  and every 10% you are able to divert it to upgrade your laser or your machine gun.

Took me 3 hours and 15 minutes to finish this game, a little bit off the intended 3 hour mark.

Controls

Left Click: Fire laser
Right Click: Fire machine guns

1: Upgrade Laser - Faster fire rate
2: Upgrade Machinegun - Additional Machine gun, up to 5
